message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $20,000 is too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I understand you're looking for a higher price, but $18,000 is still more than I'm comfortable with. Could we meet in the middle at $14,000?
